title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Integrated AI and Computational Thinking Capability Development Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design data-driven decision-making processes using AI tools in real-world business scenarios.
Learners can apply core computational thinking concepts (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithms) to solve workplace problems.
Learners can develop practical solutions that integrate AI models and CT processes through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
